changeSet.createView: select ur.USER_NAME, ur.APPLICATION_NAME, ur.ROLE_NAME, ur.ROLE_ID, ur.SCOPE_ID, f.NAME as FEATURE_NAME from ACTIVE_USER_ROLE_V ur, PERMISSION_T p, FEATURE_T f where p.ROLE_ID=ur.ROLE_ID and f.FEATURE_ID=p.FEATURE_ID

changeSet.author: emtudorsm
changeSet.createView: select distinct USER_NAME, APPLICATION_NAME, ROLE_NAME, ROLE_ID, SCOPE_ID, FEATURE_NAME, CATEGORY, DISCRIMINATOR from ( select uf.USER_NAME, uf.APPLICATION_NAME, uf.ROLE_NAME, uf.ROLE_ID, uf.SCOPE_ID, uf.FEATURE_NAME, d.CATEGORY, d.DISCRIMINATOR from ACTIVE_USER_FEATURE_V uf, SCOPE_DATASET_T sd, DATASET_T d where sd.SCOPE_ID=uf.SCOPE_ID and d.DATASET_ID=sd.DATASET_ID union select uf.USER_NAME, uf.APPLICATION_NAME, uf.ROLE_NAME, uf.ROLE_ID, uf.SCOPE_ID, uf.FEATURE_NAME, NULL as CATEGORY, NULL as DISCRIMINATOR from ACTIVE_USER_FEATURE_V uf where uf.SCOPE_ID is null )
